title: Delivery Allocation System
description: Delivery allocation system to deliver orders to the customers via delivery partners. This project was built using Spring Boot and H2 in memory database.

title: Human Resource Management System
description: HR management software, consisting of leave tracking, leave approval and payroll system functionality built using React and Spring Boot.

title: Algorithm Visualizer
description: A full stack project built using Java, JavaScript, and PostgreSQL. Algorithm Visualizer is an application to learn algorithms through visual animations. It provides a platform for viewing data structures and algorithms in action.
